tree.name: Rocco Zikarsky
tree.tradeDescription: Part of 7-team Kevin Durant trade: Bulls selected Zikarsky #45 on behalf of Timberwolves. MIN had acquired the pick by trading #36 (Adou Thiero) to LAL for #45 + cash. MIN originally got #36 by trading #31 (Rasheer Fleming) to PHX for #36 + 2 future 2nds + cash.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 2nd Round Pick (#31)
assetsGivenUp.note: MIN original 2nd round pick, traded to PHX as part of 7-team KD trade
